title: Help with a business card please!
tags: Looking for any thoughts on my business card...
content:
Hi,

I'm not a professional designer. I'm working on a business card and I'd love to hear any thoughts on what I've done thus far.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317194431im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BrianLambert-Card_6369.png)

Thanks!

Brian
author: softwarenerd

comments.content:
A well-designed card.

Just one suggestion: I’d like to see more contrast between “software” and “nerd.”

Try to find a typeface with a light weight (for software) or a heavy/black weight (for nerd) as opposed to just roman and bold, and I think you’ll be golden (the red you use for nerd on your website helps, but even there you could benefit with some weight contrast between the two words).
